Dituding Rekayasa, Novel Baswedan: Saya Luka Bakar Serius
06 Nov 2019, 03:49 by Halida Bunga, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Penyidik senior Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi, Novel Baswedan buka suara menanggapi tudingan yang menyebut penyiraman air keras terhadap dirinya adalah rekayasa. Novel bercerita, dokter yang menanganinya di Singapura mendiagnosa Novel mengalami luka bakar yang serius.
"Dokter Singapore mendiagnosa saya luka bakar serius. Sehingga saya dirawat inap sekitar 4 hari. Di situ tempat rawat inapnya diisolasi sehingga orang belum boleh masuk, karena luka bakar risiko infeksi," kata Novel kepada Tempo pada Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Novel disiram air keras oleh dua orang tak dikenal pada 11 April 2017. Ia diserang sepulang dari salat subuh berjamaah di Masjid Ihsan di dekat rumahnya. Novel kemudian dilarikan ke Rumah Sakit Mitra Keluarga lalu ke Jakarta Eye Centre.
Novel kemudian dirawat di Singapore General Hospital untuk perawatan dan observasi. Penanganan dilakukan oleh dokter dari Singapore National Eye Centre dan unit SGH Burns, bedah plastik, dan layanan THT untuk luka bakar wajah dan hidungnya.
"Saya ditangani dua dokter ahli. Dia bilang biasa menangani korban perang. Yang satu pakar ahli luka bakar, satu lagi pakar rekonstruksi wajah," ujarnya.
Media sosial belakangan ramai dengan pembicaraan kasus penyiraman air keras terhadap Novel Baswedan. Drone Emprit membaca ada beberapa akun yang bernada negatif terhadap Novel. Seperti, @Eko_Kunthadi, @03_Nakula, dan @Ary_Prasetyo. Peneliti dan analis Drone Emprit Hari Ambari, mengatakan narasi yang dibawa akun-akun ini termasuk yang paling banyak disebarkan ulang (retweet).
Gong serangan terhadap Novel dimulai ketika akun @AdellaWibawa dan @Triwulan mencuit tudingan bahwa serangan ini rekayasa. "Mata Novel Baswedan saat baru ditayangin di NET TV 18 april 2017..!?dia kaget dg tiba2 kemunculan wartawan NET, liat matanya dan pipi mulus pdhl baru kasus penyiraman," tulis si empunya akun itu pada 4 November 2019.
Menanggapi itu, Novel Baswedan menjelaskan, permukaan wajah yang terkena air keras itu tak memerlukan tindakan operasi. Luka di bagian wajahnya itu diobati dengan obat khusus. Dalam 5 hari, luka-luka yang menghitam mulai terkelupas.
"Di Singapore kebetulan bagus dan Alhamdulillah atas izin Allah bisa kembali hanya sedikit sekali yang tersisa. Hanya luka permukaan. Jadi semua tumbuh sendiri yang di muka. Saya lihat ke kaca juga enggak nampak, cuma dilihat sama orang yang dampingi," katanya.

Accused of Engineering, Baswedan Novel: I Serious Burns
Nov 6, 2019, 03:49 by Halida Bunga, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Senior Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) investigator Novel Baswedan opened his voice in response to accusations that calling him to spray hard water was fabricated. The novel tells the story, the doctor who handled it in Singapore diagnosed the Novel to have serious burns.
"The Singapore doctor diagnosed me with a serious burn. So I was hospitalized for about 4 days. There, the place of hospitalization was isolated so people were not allowed to enter, because of the burn risk of infection," Novel told Tempo on Wednesday, November 6, 2019.
The novel was doused with hard water by two unknown people on April 11, 2017. He was attacked after returning from dawn prayers in congregation at the Ihsan Mosque near his home. The novel was then rushed to Mitra Keluarga Hospital and then to the Jakarta Eye Center.
The novel was later treated at the Singapore General Hospital for treatment and observation. Treatment is carried out by doctors from the Singapore National Eye Center and SGH Burns unit, plastic surgeons, and ENT services for facial and nose burns.
"I was handled by two expert doctors. He said he used to deal with victims of war. One was an expert on burns, another was a facial reconstruction expert," he said.
Social media has recently been buzzing with talk of a case of watering hard water against Baswedan's novel. Emprit Drone read that there are several accounts that have a negative tone towards Novel. Like, @Eko_Kunthadi, @ 03_Nakula, and @Ary_Prasetyo. Researcher and analyst Drone Emprit Hari Ambari, said the narratives carried by these accounts are among the most widely redistributed (retweet).
Gong's attack on Novel began when the accounts of @ AdellaWibawa and @Triwulan tweeted that the attack was fabricated. "Mata Baswedan's novel when it was just aired on NET TV on April 18, 2017 ...!? He was shocked by the sudden appearance of NET reporters, seeing his eyes and cheeks smooth on a new watering case," wrote the owner of the account on November 4, 2019.
Responding to that, Baswedan explained that the surface of the face that was exposed to hard water did not require surgery. Wounds on the face were treated with special drugs. Within 5 days, the blackened sores began to peel off.
"In Singapore it was a good coincidence and Alhamdulillah, with God's permission, only very few were left. Only surface injuries. So all grew on their own faces. I saw the glass also not visible, only seen by the person being accompanied," he said.
